sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shīwù dǎozhì le shībài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son erreur a conduit à l'échec.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His mistake led to failure.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们不能总是处于被动状态。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bù néng zǒngshì chǔyú bèidòng zhuàngtài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous ne pouvons pas toujours être dans une position passive.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We cannot always be in a passive state.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il viendra certainement à la réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He will certainly come to the meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On ne peut pas entrer sans autorisation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Entry is not allowed without permission.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le contrôle aux frontières est très strict.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Border inspection is very strict.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Après tout, c'est encore un enfant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: After all, he is still a child.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gěi wǒ liú le yī zhāng biàntiáo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle m'a laissé un petit mot.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She left me a note.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī gěi xuéshēng zuò le shìfàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur a fait une démonstration aux élèves.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher demonstrated to the students.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 每个人都有自己的个性。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de gèxìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chaque personne a sa propre personnalité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone has their own personality.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Māma zuò de bǐng hěn hǎochī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les galettes que maman fait sont délicieuses.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The flatbreads mom makes are delicious.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le thé de l'après-midi avec des pâtisseries est très agréable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Afternoon tea with pastries is very pleasant.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiǎo māo duǒcáng zài chuáng dǐxia.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le chaton se cache sous le lit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The kitten is hiding under the bed.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个国家主要输出石油。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce pays exporte principalement du pétrole.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This country mainly exports oil.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La fenêtre est faite de verre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The window is made of glass.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne t'inquiète pas pour les petites choses.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't worry about small things.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他每天更新自己的博客。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā měitiān gēngxīn zìjǐ de bókè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il met à jour son blog tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He updates his blog every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a obtenu un doctorat.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He obtained a doctoral degree.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants aiment manger des biscuits.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children like to eat cookies.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 周末我们去参观博物馆。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le week-end, nous allons visiter le musée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: On the weekend, we will visit the museum.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bùgù wēixiǎn qù jiù rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a ignoré le danger pour sauver quelqu'un.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He disregarded the danger to save someone.
